### Idiom: 碌碌无奇
### Meaning: 平凡，无特殊才能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2023年1月，《血之辙》的实体与电子单行本合计销售量突破200万。主人公长部静一是一位碌碌无奇的普通中二生，尽管表面上与其母亲静子的关系很好，但后者明显对其儿子保护过度。暑假期间，长部家和亲戚一起去爬山。
target: In January 2023, the combined sales volume of physical and electronic single copies of "Blood Trail" exceeded 2 million. The protagonist, Nagabe Shizuichi, is an ordinary middle school student. Although he has a good relationship with his mother Shizuko on the surface, the latter is obviously overprotective of his son. During the summer vacation, the Nagabe family went hiking with relatives.

context:
### Idiom: 无相无作
### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 初发心菩萨名之为住…若有菩萨初发心者。修行于空无相无作。解一切法无生无灭。
target: The name of the Bodhisattva who has first aroused his mind is Dwelling... If there is a Bodhisattva who has just aroused his mind. Practice in emptiness without form or action. Understand that all dharmas have neither birth nor death.

context:
### Idiom: 身无长处
### Meaning: 除一身之外再没有多余的东西。原指生活俭朴。现形容贫穷。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 大陆网友看后议论纷纷，一致解读出爸爸临终遗言 ── ‘不要难过，我想你坚强’，瞬间感动落泪，‘应该是，真的泪崩’、‘认同这个’、‘我哭了’。也有网友安慰原po‘亲人离去，但只要我们不忘记，他就永远在’，并分享自己父亲临终遗言，‘ 我爸临终时候说，这一生身无长处，不曾留下什么给我，我哭到说不出来话，我想对他说，并不是的，你给了我柔软的灵魂和此后漫长的一生’、‘想起我爸爸临终前，因为太累了，没有及时给我爸换纸尿裤，生自己的气，气哭了，边哭边帮我爸换纸尿裤，他突然看着我，飙出来一句妹啊你要坚强啊’。延伸阅读：
target: After seeing this, mainland netizens had discussions, and unanimously interpreted the dying words of the father: "Don't be sad, I'm thinking of you." Instantly moved to tears, "It should be, I cried," "I agree with this," "I cried." Some netizens comforted the original poster "The loved ones have gone, but as long as we don't forget him, he will always be with us." They also shared their father's last words, "My father said at the end of his life, he had nothing to leave me, and he cried so much that he couldn't say anything, I want to tell him that he didn't, he gave me a soft soul and a long life afterward," "I remembered my father when he was at the end of his life because he was too tired to help him change his diapers in time, and he was angry at himself, and he cried and helped me change his diapers. Suddenly he looked at me and yelled, "Sister, you have to be strong."

context:
### Idiom: 此地无银三百两
### Meaning: 比喻想要隐瞒掩饰，结果反而暴露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: “汉奸”两字始现于清朝，根据日本神户大学教授王柯的考证，雍正年间，曾有汉人与“苗顽”联手对抗清廷在西南边疆的“改土归流”政策，这些人被骂为“汉奸”。事实上，此一名词为满人首创，基本目的即是“此地无银三百两”银三百两，原因在于自己是满人，所污蔑为汉奸者，其实是“满奸”，真实意义是背叛满清皇室者。清代史料中最早使用“汉奸”一词是康熙年间贵州巡抚田雯的《古欢堂集·黔书》：苗盗之患，起于汉奸。
target: The two words "traitor" first appeared in the Qing Dynasty. According to Wang Kao, a professor at Kobe University in Japan, in the Yongzheng period, there were Han people who joined forces with "Miao rebels" to resist the Qing government’s "reclamation and return" policy in the western border areas. These people were called "traitors". In fact, this expression was created by the Manchus, and its basic purpose was "there is no silver here worth three hundred taels". The reason was that he was a Manchu, and those who slandered him as a traitor were actually "Manchu traitors", which actually means that they betrayed the Qing Dynasty. The earliest use of the word "traitor" in history is in the "Guanghuangtang Collection" by Tian Wen, the governor of Guizhou in the Kangxi period: the trouble of the Miao rebels started with the traitors.

context:
### Idiom: 泥牛入海
### Meaning: 语本《景德传灯录·潭州龙山和尚》：“洞山又问和尚：‘见个什麽道理，便住此山？’师云：‘我见两个泥牛斗入海，直至如今无消息。’”后因以“泥牛入海”比喻一去不返，杳无消息。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 实际执行中，只要发现没有携带合法证件，就可能被当成“三无”人员被抓捕。然而，这些公民在向全国人大常委会要求启动合宪性审查之后，似“泥牛入海”无消息。对于公民启动合宪性审查程序，全国人大常委会法工委法规备案审查工作室并没有表示是否受理，是否进行了审查，也没有答复。
target: In actual execution, as long as you are found not to be carrying legal documents, you may be arrested as a "three noes" person. However, after these citizens requested the National People's Congress Standing Committee to initiate a constitutional review, there was no news. For citizens to initiate the constitutionality review process, the Law and Regulations Registration Review Office of the Legal Affairs Committee of the National People's Congress Standing Committee did not indicate whether it accepted the case or whether it had conducted a review, nor did it respond.

context:
### Idiom: 将功赎罪
### Meaning: 拿功劳补偿过失。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 杜兰特最后1分24秒飙进三分球，把比数追成106比109，接著保罗两罚俱中，双方只差1分，接下来快艇连攻3波都没进球，却让韦斯布鲁克最后17.7秒两罚俱中，韦斯布鲁克接著更赏戴文布克火锅，更把球砸到布克脚上出界，太阳只好送艾瑞克戈登最后7.9秒两罚俱中，也让胜负底定。韦斯布鲁克虽然全场投19中3，只拿9分、8助攻与10篮板，却在最后关头靠著罚球与火锅将功赎罪，艾瑞克戈登19分，鲍威尔14分，祖巴兹12分、15篮板；杜兰特拿下26分、11助攻与9篮板的准大三元，戴文布克也拿26分，可惜两人仍然无法挽回场上颓势。
target: Dustin Durant hit a late 3rd-quarter treble in the last 1.24 minutes, which gave the Rockets a one-point lead, but although the Rockets had 3 consecutive attempts and did not score, they were given a two-point lead by Maurice Clarett in the last 17.7 seconds, Clarett then gave a hot dog to Duncan Cook, who was fouled by the Rockets. Aaron Gordon scored 19 points, Kevin Durant 14 points, and Bobby Haslam 14 points and 15 rebounds, but neither could make up for the loss.

context:
### Idiom: 杀鸡取卵
### Meaning: 比喻贪图眼前微小好处而损害长远利益。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 提高政治站位，关键在于去掉内心的私欲，激发挖掘那一颗全心全意为人民服务的心，这就是致良知。相对于全国，地方固然是局部，但是相对于辖区，地方又何尝不是整体?一些地方，取利一时的短视决策寻常可见，杀鸡取卵的短期行为时有发生，莫不与缺少战略思维有关。一要提高政治站位，学会从政治上看问题，站稳政治立场、把准政治方向、增强政治定力、锤炼政治品格，始终牢记政治责任，做政治上的明白人。
target: The key to raising political awareness is to remove egos from the inside, stimulate a heart to serve the people sincerely. When taking short-term decisions for one-time gain, short-term actions to kill chickens for a few eggs are common, it is all a result of a lack of strategy.

context:
### Idiom: 戴罪立功
### Meaning: 谓判了罪而给予立功赎罪的机会。也泛指犯罪后立功赎罪。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 随着社会不断发展，现代生活日新月异，诸如网络安全、冻卵技术、基因识别、直播带货、校园霸凌、正当防卫等新的社会问题层出不穷，相关案件也频频发生，这必然要求法律条令的不断修订完善。不唯如此，作为律师，不仅要维护他得到公正审判的权利，还要劝说他主动认清真相，戴罪立功。剧中精心设计的案例，不仅是剧中人面临的问题，也是当前社会的集体关切，具有代表性和警示意义。
target: As society develops, modern life is constantly changing. New social issues such as cybersecurity, egg freezing technology, genetic identification, live broadcasting, school bullying, and justifiable defense have emerged one after another, and related cases have also occurred frequently. This will inevitably require the revision and improvement of laws and regulations. Not only that, as a lawyer, he not only has the right to obtain a fair trial, but also needs to persuade him to voluntarily acknowledge the facts and take the blame. The carefully designed cases in the play are not only the problems that the people in the play face, but also the collective concerns of the current society. They have representative significance and warning significance.

context:
### Idiom: 隐恶扬善
### Meaning: 隐隐匿；扬宣扬。不谈人的坏处，光宣扬人的好处。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 其实讨论蓝牙的楼主，说的不少都是事实，也是蓝牙制式的硬伤，但手机／耳机厂想出不少点子去隐恶扬善，令无线耳机有更多有线耳机做不到的优点。
target: Actually, the original poster discussing Bluetooth is stating quite a few facts, which are also the inherent drawbacks of the Bluetooth standard. However, mobile phone/earphone manufacturers have come up with quite a few ideas to hide the negatives and highlight the positives, making wireless earphones have more advantages that wired earphones cannot achieve.

### Idiom: 酒囊饭袋
### Meaning: 囊口袋。只会吃喝，不会做事。讥讽无能的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: ”正因为自己的影响力不断扩大，普里戈任才有底气充当批评军事将领的少数派。普里戈任直接批评国防部，说国防部的官员是酒囊饭袋。他也批评俄罗斯的其他精英，包括议会议员和寡头，其中他指责寡头在战争期间“偷走了一切原本属于人民的东西”。
target: It is only because of his growing influence that Pugachev dares to be a minority in criticizing the military commanders. Pugachev directly criticized the Ministry of Defense, saying that the officials of the Ministry of Defense were the pockets of the military commanders. He also criticized other Russian elites, including parliamentarians and oligarchs, and among them he accused the oligarchs of "stealing everything originally belonging to the people" during the war.

### Idiom: 戴罪立功
### Meaning: 谓判了罪而给予立功赎罪的机会。也泛指犯罪后立功赎罪。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 孩子越是废物，越会抱着“原生家庭”“童年缺爱”两大法宝不放，因为实在是太好用的口袋罪名，只要祭出这两个罪，父母便望风披靡，只好戴罪立功，给房给钱，养着这废物。
target: The more a degenerate child is, the more he will hold on to "the original family" and "childhood abuse" for it is really very useful pocket labels, once they are thrown out, parents will be able to take advantage of these two labels, giving their home and money to the degenerate.

context:
### Idiom: 胸中万卷
### Meaning: 指读过大量的书。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 今天背诵的是苏轼的《沁园春》“孤馆灯青”。佳句是“世路无穷，劳生有限”，“有笔头千字，胸中万卷”，“身长健，但优游卒岁”。苏轼写给弟弟苏辙格外好的诗词，除了脍炙人口的《水调歌头》“明月几时有”，还有《和子由渑池怀旧》“人生到处知何似，应似飞鸿踏雪泥。
target: Today's recitation is Su Shi's "Qinyuan Spring" "Lanterns in a solitary inn." The beautiful sentences are "The road of the world is endless, and life is limited," "There are a thousand words in my pen and ten thousand books in my heart," and "As long as my body is healthy, I will just leisurely spend my years." Su Shi wrote particularly good poems and songs for his younger brother Su Zhe, besides the well-known "When will the bright moon appear," there is also "When recalling old friends in Mianchi, what is life like? It should be like a flying wild goose stepping on snow."

context:
### Idiom: 嫣然一笑
### Meaning: 形容娇媚的微笑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 女孩问：你写不写？我当下赧然苦笑，先伸出自认有点仙风道骨的左手，接著再伸出打了30多年网球，关节早已肿胀变形的右手，女孩立刻善解人意嫣然一笑，我戳戳岿然挺立的中指跟食指，再点点其他三指说：这就像希特勒的地堡沦陷（困兽犹斗）女孩立刻收起笑脸说：在我们国家不能随便谈论他。
target: The girl asked: "Are you writing?" I was ashamed and smiled bitterly. I stretched out my left hand that was a little bit like a fairy, and then stretched out the right hand that had played tennis for more than 30 years and the joints had swollen and deformed. The girl understood and smiled, and I poked my middle finger and index finger and then tapped the other three fingers: It's like Hitler's bunker (the tiger is still fighting). The girl immediately understood and said: "We can't talk about him in our country."

context:
### Idiom: 昏迷不省
### Meaning: 神志昏沉，不省人事。同昏迷不醒”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 至中午12时许，卫生署人员到场接走老翁，送他返回蓝田寓所继续接受家居隔离。2022年1月4日，清平楼一名女户主返回住所后，发现22岁女儿房间上锁，其后强行人房后发现已经昏迷不省人事。。而救护员亦在房间内发现另一名20岁已经失去知觉的女子，经检查后，证实两名女子当场身亡。
target: Around 12 noon, personnel from the Health Bureau arrived to take the old man away and sent him back to his residence in Lam Tin to continue his home quarantine. On January 4, 2022, a female homeowner returned to her residence in Qingping Building and found her 22-year-old daughter's room locked. After forcibly entering the room, she found her daughter unconscious. Ambulance staff also found another 20-year-old woman in the room who had lost consciousness. After examination, it was confirmed that both women had died on the spot.

context:
### Idiom: 反攻倒算
### Meaning: 指被打倒的阶级敌人或反动势力纠集起来向革命人民进行反扑报复。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 1929年8月19日，他在李立民同志带领下，参加了第一次攻打上杭城的战斗。根据地逐渐被敌占领，反动豪绅地主纠集还乡团，疯狂报复，反攻倒算，妄图杀绝共产党人，一举扑灭革命力量。1930年上半年，全福加入了共产主义青年团组织，担任乡团支部书记。
target: On August 19, 1929, under the leadership of Comrade Li Limin, he participated in the first battle to attack Shanghang City. The base area was gradually occupied by the enemy, and the reactionary gentry and landlords gathered the returnees to retaliate wildly, counterattack, and vainly attempted to kill all the Communists and wipe out the revolutionary forces in one fell swoop. In the first half of 1930, Quan Fu joined the Communist Youth League organization and served as the secretary of the township branch.

context:
### Idiom: 焦头烂额
### Meaning: ①形容被火烧伤得很严重。②指牺牲惨重。③喻处境狼狈或十分窘迫。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 今天也被问到了关于离别的事。虽然各种查让大家都焦头烂额，但我突然希望这个运动会开长一点，让那些人继续各种查，这样我就可以名正言顺地多逃避一段时间。我一点都不想知道最后前途几何、出路何方，我现在就想逃开这个话题。
target: Today I was asked about parting as well. Although the various checks have driven everyone crazy, I suddenly hope that this sports meeting will be longer, so that those people can continue the various checks, so that I can have a good reason to escape for a longer period of time. I don't want to know at all about the future prospects and出路何方, I just want to escape from this topic now.

context:
### Idiom: 走投无路
### Meaning: 无路可走。比喻陷入绝境，没有出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 也遇到了个“沙雕同事”，觉得他说的话都很精辟，挺搞笑的。18岁，路还很长，不到走投无路应该都不会进厂。前几天还在上班，负责人跟我问我回学校是继续上学还是直接毕业，可能是想让我再干一段时间吧，我只能笑着说不会来了。
target: I also met a "sandbag" colleague. I felt that what he said was very sharp and quite funny. I was 18 years old, and I have a long way to go. I should not be desperate. I went to work a few days ago, and the person in charge asked me whether I went back to school or graduated directly. I could only laugh and say I would not come back.

context:
### Idiom: 河水不洗船
### Meaning: 比喻不相干或相安无事。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 清·吴敬梓《儒林外史》第十四回：“我是一片本心，特地来报信，我也只愿得无事，落得“河水不洗船”。
target: Qing Dynasty writer Wu Jingzi's "Outlaws of the Marsh": "I came here with the best intentions to deliver this message. I just hope everything turns out well, so that it won't be like 'the river doesn't wash the boat'."

context:
### Idiom: 不知就里
### Meaning: 不了解内情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在体力、时间及Budget均相当有限的情况下，Arthur与行仔的8天行程依然丰富，玩匀海陆空之余，更在制作组安排下，卖港式鸡蛋仔赚盘川，行仔全程豁出去大声叫卖，Arthur则贯彻‘迷男郎’本色迷失到底。今明播放的头两集，出发时喜气洋洋的Arthur和行仔，甫落机即被制作组强行‘开始拍摄’，完全不知就里的二人，在没有剧本及任何资讯的情况下，开始了为期8天的‘丧行’之旅。2人首个任务挑战‘豪华海景野餐’，单是寻找合适景点及食物已行到脚酸，其间更遇上猴子小偷将2人辛苦得来的驰名鸭肉‘毁掉’，令他们要‘返回起点重新出发’。
target: In limited time, energy and budget, Arthur and Xiao Hei's eight-day journey is still rich in content. While playing on land, sea and air, the production team arranged for them to sell Hong Kong-style egg tarts. Xiao Hei was allowed to shout out loud to attract customers, while Arthur was allowed to play the role of "lost boy" while wandering around. The first two episodes to be broadcast today and tomorrow will focus on the departure of Arthur and Xiao Hei. The two were forced to start filming by the production team when they arrived at the destination. Since they did not have a script or any information, the two did not know what to do. Their first mission was to challenge "luxury sea view picnic". It was not an easy task to find a suitable location and food. The two encountered a monkey that stole their hard-earned duck meat, forcing them to "start over" from the beginning.

context:
### Idiom: 艰深晦涩
### Meaning: 艰深文辞深奥难懂；晦涩意义隐晦，不顺口。形容笔调深僻、寓意难以理解的文章。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 近年来，中医药文化在中国和世界一些国家抗疫中发挥重要作用，较好地诠释了中华优秀传统文化的当代价值，成为推动中华优秀传统文化“活起来”“走出去”的典范。中华优秀传统文化典籍浩瀚，许多典籍艰深晦涩、不易读懂，亟须将古典话语体系进行现代转化，构建大众化、时代化的传承话语体系。2022年，国务院办公厅印发《“十四五”中医药发展规划》，中医药文化将深入千家万户，走向世界各地，在推动中华优秀传统文化创造性转化、创新性发展中更好地发挥标杆作用。
target: In recent years, traditional Chinese medicine culture has played an important role in epidemic prevention and control in China and some countries around the world, well interpreting the contemporary value of excellent traditional Chinese culture and becoming a model for promoting the revitalization and going global of excellent traditional Chinese culture. The classics of excellent traditional Chinese culture are vast, many of which are profound and obscure, making it urgent to modernize the classical discourse system and build a popular and modern inheritance discourse system. In 2022, the General Office of the State Council issued the "14th Five-Year Plan for the Development of Traditional Chinese Medicine", and traditional Chinese medicine culture will penetrate every household and go to every corner of the world, playing a better leading role in the creative transformation and innovative development of excellent traditional Chinese culture.

### Idiom: 牛溲马勃
### Meaning: 牛溲牛尿，一说车前草，利小便；马勃可治疮。比喻一般人认为无用的东西，在懂得其性能的人手里可成为有用的物品。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 赛瑞斯的粪便移植药丸，专供抗生素治疗过的再患者使用。十年前就有医生说，他们用粪便移植疗法治愈患者；牛溲马勃皆可入药，食药局 去年批准费灵制药的粪便移植药，这个‘初版’药要从肛门塞入。赛瑞斯的药丸叫做Vowst，每日服用四颗，连服三天即可。
target: Seres's faecal transplant capsule is designed for patients who have had antibiotics to treat their infection. A decade ago, doctors were saying they were curing patients with faecal transplant therapy; dung was being fed to cows, which then produced milk which was used to make medicine. The first version of the capsule, which was approved by the FDA last year, had to be inserted into the rectum. Seres's capsule is called Vowst and is taken four times a day for three days.

### Idiom: 无以复加
### Meaning: 不能再增加。谓已至极限。语本《左传·文公十七年》：“敝邑有亡，无以加焉。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 林美美还硬着头皮不承认，结果又吃了两个大嘴巴子，人都快打傻了，老爸拿出来了那个海报，上边赫然是她的照片，不得不说，她的心酸到了无以复加的程度，自己还不是想给家里减少负担，只不过采用了这种不恰当的方式，当然如果这是发生在大城市，那种人与人之间特别冷漠的环境，也就没有什么大不了的事情，毕竟这个时代，还有几个女孩子的心灵是干净的，可家里的这些父老乡亲不同，他们一辈子也没有出过什么远门，对于外面的世界都充满了惊奇和畏惧，所以她的行为，就被扣上了不可饶恕的罪名，这让林美美十分揪心，她一时间百口莫辩，感觉自己都要被扔鸡蛋了，突然之间发现她的老爸似乎也沧桑了不少，原来不知不觉间，自己背弃的不仅仅是良心，还有家里人的殷切期待，唉，可事已至此，有什么办法呢。
target: Lin Meimei still stubbornly refused to admit it, but she ended up getting hit in the face twice, so hard that she was almost knocked out. Her dad took out that poster with her photo on it. It couldn't be denied that her heartache was overwhelming. She wasn't trying to reduce the burden on the family, but she had just adopted an inappropriate way. Of course, if this happened in a big city where people are冷漠, it wouldn't be a big deal. After all, in this era, not many girls have pure hearts. But her hometown folks are different. They've never been far from home and are full of amazement and fear about the outside world. So her behavior was labeled unforgivable, which made Lin Meimei very upset. She couldn't find words to defend herself and felt like she was about to be thrown eggs at. Suddenly, she realized that her dad seemed to be a lot more沧桑. It turned out that without her knowing it, what she had betrayed was not only her conscience but also the family's high expectations.唉, but what can you do now that it's come to this?

target: Serex's fecal transplant pills are intended for use in patients who have been treated with antibiotics. Siris's pill is called Vowst, and you can take four pills a day for three days.

### Idiom: 江山易改，本性难移

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 江山易改，本性难移，成年之后一个人的品格基本形成，如果在婚前的选择上仔细辨别，一定程度上能远离渣男。
target: "The landscape is easy to change, but human nature is hard to move. After adulthood, a person's character is basically formed. If one carefully discerns in the choice before marriage, to a certain extent, one can stay away from bad men."

### Idiom: 连篇累牍
### Meaning: 形容篇幅多，文辞长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 但在政治站位上，《银行周报》的立场较为复杂，一面号召同业抵制北洋政府债券，另一方面却又认为国民政府摊销债券“用途得当，信用巩固”，但到了国民政府发债太多、侵害利益时又啧有烦言。1927年蒋中正上台后，《银行周报》对共产党组织罢工的反对文章连篇累牍，认为应该保护国货以满足工人需求，但在五卅运动抵制日货时却又表现悲观。《银行周报》总编徐沧水认为，虽然《银行周报》创办伊始银行公会尚未成立，但《银行周报》已经成为了各家银行的共同事业，为上海银行公会的最终成立奠定了基础。
target: However, in terms of political stance, the position of "Banking Weekly" is rather complex. On one hand, it called on its peers to boycott the bonds of the Beiyang Government, but on the other hand, it believed that the bonds issued by the Nationalist Government were "appropriately used and creditworthy". But when the Nationalist Government issued too many bonds and harmed interests, it showed annoyance. After Chiang Kai-shek came to power in 1927, "Banking Weekly" published a series of articles opposing the Communist Party's organization of strikes, arguing that domestic products should be protected to meet workers' needs. However, it showed pessimism during the May 30th Movement's boycott of Japanese goods. Xu Cangshui, the editor-in-chief of "Banking Weekly", believed that although the Banking Association had not yet been established at the beginning of the establishment of "Banking Weekly", "Banking Weekly" has become a common cause of various banks and laid the foundation for the final establishment of the Shanghai Banking Association.

target: In my heart, the branches are filled with flowers, and my eyes are filled with red. In my chest, there are thousands of pictures, and every stroke I write is mountains and rivers. When I got home, I saw that the apricot blossoms were almost all white - it seemed that the flowers were about to fade away.

source: 记忆中端午节一直说快乐，也就最近几年忽然流行安康其实说啥都无所谓反正是祝福的意思，但好像说“快乐”就显得没文化似的，劳春燕居然煞有介事地科普起来我猜“安康”一词看起来文绉绉一些，假文人就生拉硬扯，她刚开始做短视频“你会读书吗吗”、“这样读书全错了”把我吓滴一愣一愣滴 查看图片。
target: In memory, the Dragon Boat Festival has always been said to be happy. Only in recent years has it suddenly become popular to say "safe and sound". It doesn't matter what you say, as long as it's a blessing. But it seems like saying "happy" makes you seem uncultured. Lu Chunyan actually took the trouble to科普起来. I guess the word "safe and sound" looks more refined, and fake scholars will force it. She started making short videos "Can you read?" and "You're reading all wrong" which scared me silly 查看图片.

### Idiom: 早出晚归
### Meaning: 早晨出去，晚上归来。谓整日在外。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 林智坚凌晨在脸书发文表示，过去因工作关系，虽然忙，但总可以回到家和太太聊天、抱抱孩子，但在去年选举那段日子，忙到几乎没时间和家人吃顿饭，只能趁著晚上和孩子短暂视讯，那种对家人思念与亏欠，令他难熬。林智坚表示，大儿子已五年级、二儿子三年级，妹妹则已经小学一年级，他担任市长职务早出晚归，许多重要节日总是扮演市民的市长，而不是尽责的爸爸。林智坚说，突如其来的转变和挫折，反而让他在家庭生活中得到更多，今天将和妻子、三个孩子，第一次一起度过属于一家人的儿童节，不再是于儿童艺术节活动现场上匆匆的招呼。
target: Lin Zhiqian wrote on Facebook early in the morning, saying that although he was busy due to work in the past, he could always go home and chat with his wife and hug his children. But during the election period last year, he was so busy that he almost didn't have time to have a meal with his family, and he could only briefly video chat with his children at night, which made him miss and feel guilty for his family. Lin Zhiqian said that his eldest son is in the fifth grade, his second son is in the third grade, and his younger sister is in the first grade of primary school. He has been the mayor of the city and works from early in the morning to late at night, often playing the role of the mayor for the citizens instead of being a responsible father during many important festivals. Lin Zhiqian said that the sudden change and setback actually brought him more in his family life. Today, he will spend Children's Day for the first time with his wife and three children, instead of briefly greeting them at the Children's Art Festival site.
